title: Mesa
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: knotting technique sometimes called 'cavandoli' in which yarns are either  hidden or covered in a complementary manner
description: Hanging, stepped at the upper edge, patterned with small geometric forms in black, and with long multicolor fringe shaped into a curve at the bottom. Muted colors ranging from blues and greens to yellow and red, with black.
name: Hanging
